column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Unalaq says : " It 's a shame the Southerners have abandoned all connections to the spirits .
#Text=It 's fun .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " This festival used to be a solemn time of fasting and meditation .
#Text=Now it 's just a chance to watch some rube try to stick an entire arctic hen in his mouth .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=Oh , it 's so good .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Traditions change .
#Text=It 's not the end of the world .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Tell that to the sailors who are being attacked by angry spirits in southern waters .
#Text=Some traditions have purpose .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , spirits are attacking ships ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I 'm surprised the Avatar does n't know about that .
#Text=Apparently you have n't been given all of the information you need .
#Text=It would be my honor to instruct you in the spiritual ways of the Water Tribe .
#Text=" Korra says : " I would n't mind learning about fighting spirits .
#Text=Airbending is getting pretty boring .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Tenzin is Korra 's instructor .
#Text=He can give her all the training she needs .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " So you 've said .
#Text="
